trans-unit.source: --marft option take as input a list of minor allele read frequency threshold. Genotype with minor allele read frequency lower than threshold will be tagged lowMARF
trans-unit.target: --marft option take as input a list of minor allele read frequency threshold. Genotype with minor allele read frequency lower than threshold will be tagged lowMARF

trans-unit.source: --read and --marft filtering options can be used to test different set of genotype filtering:
trans-unit.target: --read and --marft filtering options can be used to test different set of genotype filtering:

trans-unit.source: --read option take as input a list of read coverage threshold. Genotype with read coverage lower than threshold will be tagged lowCov
trans-unit.target: --read option take as input a list of read coverage threshold. Genotype with read coverage lower than threshold will be tagged lowCov

trans-unit.source: For R lovers, there is an extra script ("scripts/SFS_genotypes_profiles_plot.R") to plot SFS with genotype profiles from file. Example:
trans-unit.target: For R lovers, there is an extra script ("scripts/SFS_genotypes_profiles_plot.R") to plot SFS with genotype profiles from file. Example:

trans-unit.source: For each filtering combination ("read coverage" + "minor allele read frequency"), Pop-Con plots 2 figures (for SNP and indel):
trans-unit.target: For each filtering combination ("read coverage" + "minor allele read frequency"), Pop-Con plots 2 figures (for SNP and indel):

trans-unit.source: For figure 1, two plots are produced:
trans-unit.target: 図1については、2つのプロットが生成されます。

trans-unit.source: For figure 2, only SFS plot with observed genotype profiles proportion is produced. This plot can be used to detect abnormal porpotion of low read coverage, low minor allele read frequency or ungenotyped individuals but display is not satisfying for now...
trans-unit.target: 図2については、観測された遺伝子型プロファイルの割合を用いたSFSプロットのみを作成しています。このプロットは、リードカバレッジが低い、マイナーアレルのリード頻度が低い、遺伝子型を持たない個体の異常なポーショニングを検出するために使用できますが、今のところ表示が満足できるものではありません...。

trans-unit.source: For sites where all individuals are genotyped and passed read coverage + minor allele read frequency filtering
trans-unit.target: すべての個体がジェノタイピングされ、リードカバレッジ+マイナーアレルリード頻度フィルタリングを通過したサイトの場合

trans-unit.source: For sites where at least 1 individual is genotyped and passed read coverage + minor allele read frequency filtering
trans-unit.target: 少なくとも1人の個体がジェノタイピングされ、リードカバレッジ+マイナーアレルリード頻度フィルタリングに合格したサイトの場合

trans-unit.source: If the VCF file contains SNP and indel variants, Pop-Con will create two directories "SNP/" and "indel/" in current directory.
trans-unit.target: If the VCF file contains SNP and indel variants, Pop-Con will create two directories "SNP/" and "indel/" in current directory.

trans-unit.target: マニュアルインストール

trans-unit.target: orr

trans-unit.source: Pop-Con has been developped on VCF files produced with GATK [3] and read2snp [4] variant callers. Variant caller used to produced VCF file has to be given with option --tool (GATK is the default variant caller).
trans-unit.target: Pop-Con has been developped on VCF files produced with GATK [3] and read2snp [4] variant callers. Variant caller used to produced VCF file has to be given with option --tool (GATK is the default variant caller).

trans-unit.source: Pop-Con is a tool designed to visualize genotype profiles of a Site Frequency Spectrum (SFS) from a Variant Calling Format (VCF) file [1] for SNP and indel variant. We define a genotype profile as the list of genotypes for all individuals at a given site. For example, "0/1,1/1,0/1,0/1" is the genotype profile corresponding to the VCF line below:
trans-unit.target: Pop-Con is a tool designed to visualize genotype profiles of a Site Frequency Spectrum (SFS) from a Variant Calling Format (VCF) file [1] for SNP and indel variant. We define a genotype profile as the list of genotypes for all individuals at a given site. For example, "0/1,1/1,0/1,0/1" is the genotype profile corresponding to the VCF line below:

trans-unit.source: Pop-Con is supported on Linux with python2 (version==2.7) and python3 (versions>=3.4) and surely supported on Macintosh and Windows with the pypi python packages manager but not tested.
trans-unit.target: Pop-Con is supported on Linux with python2 (version==2.7) and python3 (versions>=3.4) and surely supported on Macintosh and Windows with the pypi python packages manager but not tested.

trans-unit.source: Pop-Con takes as input a VCF file and uses the cyvcf2 python package [2] to read and parse the VCF file To be readable and parsable by cyvcf2 the VCf file has to be compressed and indexed with one of the 2 following command lines:
trans-unit.target: Pop-Con takes as input a VCF file and uses the cyvcf2 python package [2] to read and parse the VCF file To be readable and parsable by cyvcf2 the VCf file has to be compressed and indexed with one of the 2 following command lines:

trans-unit.source: Pop-Con: a tool to visualize genotype profiles on Site Frequency Spectrum
trans-unit.target: Pop-Con:サイト周波数スペクトル上の遺伝子型プロファイルを可視化するツール

trans-unit.source: Source from GitHub
trans-unit.target: ソースはGitHubから

trans-unit.source: TROUBLESHOOTING
trans-unit.target: トラブルシューティング

trans-unit.source: The 2 SFS plot with genotype profiles produced:
trans-unit.target: 遺伝子型プロファイルが生成された2 SFSプロット。

trans-unit.source: This assumes that you have the python modules cyvcf2, numpy and matplotlib installed (cf requirements.txt).
trans-unit.target: This assumes that you have the python modules cyvcf2, numpy and matplotlib installed (cf requirements.txt).

trans-unit.source: This error can also arise if you used an other variant caller tool than GATK or read2snp as Pop-Con was only tested on VCF files produced by those. If you encountered such problem can you please write an issue, I'll try to shortly produce a new module to parse the VCF produced by the variant caller you used.
trans-unit.target: This error can also arise if you used an other variant caller tool than GATK or read2snp as Pop-Con was only tested on VCF files produced by those. If you encountered such problem can you please write an issue, I'll try to shortly produce a new module to parse the VCF produced by the variant caller you used.

trans-unit.source: This script only plot SFS with observed porportion of genotype profiles and the one with comparison to the expected values under the Hardy-Weinberg equilibrium:
trans-unit.target: このスクリプトは、遺伝子型プロファイルのポーショニングが観測されたSFSと、Hardy-Weinberg平衡下での期待値と比較したSFSのみをプロットします。

trans-unit.source: USAGE
trans-unit.target: 使用法

trans-unit.source: Using pip (recommended)
trans-unit.target: pipの使用(推奨

trans-unit.source: Visualization of genotype profiles on population genomics data for detection of abnormal genotypes pattern.
trans-unit.target: 集団ゲノミクスデータ上の遺伝子型プロファイルを可視化し、異常遺伝子型パターンを検出する。

trans-unit.source: Where individuals 1, 3 and 4 are heterozygote ("0/1") and individual 3 is homozygote for the alternative allele ("1/1") for this site.
trans-unit.target: ここで、個体1、3および4はヘテロ接合体(「0/1」)であり、個体3はこの部位の代替対立遺伝子(「1/1」)に対するホモ接合体である。

trans-unit.source: Yoann Anselmetti : yoann.anselmetti@umontpellier.fr
trans-unit.target: Yoann Anselmetti : yoann.anselmetti@umontpellier.fr

trans-unit.target: You get the following error message, when you forgot to set the option --tool read2snp .

trans-unit.source: You have to install it manually from the source: https://github.com/brentp/cyvcf2
trans-unit.target: You have to install it manually from the source: https://github.com/brentp/cyvcf2

trans-unit.source: [1] Danecek, P. et al. The variant call format and VCFtools. Bioinformatics 27, 2156–2158 (2011). [2] Pedersen, B. S. & Quinlan, A. R. cyvcf2: fast, flexible variant analysis with Python. Bioinformatics 33, 1867–1869 (2017). [3] McKenna, A. et al. The Genome Analysis Toolkit: A MapReduce framework for analyzing next-generation DNA sequencing data. Genome Res. 20, 1297–1303 (2010). [4] Gayral, P. et al. Reference-Free Population Genomics from Next-Generation Transcriptome Data and the Vertebrate–Invertebrate Gap. PLOS Genetics 9, e1003457 (2013).
trans-unit.target: [1] Danecek, P. et al. The variant call format and VCFtools. Bioinformatics 27, 2156–2158 (2011). [2] Pedersen, B. S. & Quinlan, A. R. cyvcf2: fast, flexible variant analysis with Python. Bioinformatics 33, 1867–1869 (2017). [3] McKenna, A. et al. The Genome Analysis Toolkit: A MapReduce framework for analyzing next-generation DNA sequencing data. Genome Res. 20, 1297–1303 (2010). [4] Gayral, P. et al. Reference-Free Population Genomics from Next-Generation Transcriptome Data and the Vertebrate–Invertebrate Gap. PLOS Genetics 9, e1003457 (2013).

trans-unit.source: a lower plot representing for each pic the expected proportion of genotype profile under the Hardy-Weinberg equilibrium. Genotype profiles are colored in red if observed genotype profile is Y times upper Hardy-Weinberg expectation, blue if Y times lower and white if at equilibrum (between Y times upper and Y times lower). Where Y is set with the option -fold/--hwe_fold_change
trans-unit.target: a lower plot representing for each pic the expected proportion of genotype profile under the Hardy-Weinberg equilibrium. Genotype profiles are colored in red if observed genotype profile is Y times upper Hardy-Weinberg expectation, blue if Y times lower and white if at equilibrum (between Y times upper and Y times lower). Where Y is set with the option -fold/--hwe_fold_change

trans-unit.source: an upper plot representing the observed proportion of the X most represented genotype profiles for each SFS pic (X is set with the -max/--max_profiles option)
trans-unit.target: an upper plot representing the observed proportion of the X most represented genotype profiles for each SFS pic (X is set with the -max/--max_profiles option)

trans-unit.source: with all sites where at least 1 individual is genotyped and passed read coverage and minor allele read frequency filtering.
trans-unit.target: 少なくとも1人の個体がジェノタイプ化され、リードカバレッジとマイナーアレルのリード周波数フィルタリングを通過したすべてのサイトを含む。

trans-unit.source: with sites where all individuals are genotyped and passed read coverage and minor allele read frequency filtering.
trans-unit.target: すべての個体がジェノタイプ化され、リードカバレッジとマイナーアレルのリード頻度フィルタリングを通過したサイトを持つ。
